name: It's about YOU
description:
Me and You

Hello, I guess I don't need to introduce myself if you've looked properly at the screenshots.

If you haven't... 

Look at the screenshots.

Now you know about me... Now tell me something about YOU

Controls:

1. Turn on the water heater.

2. Grab a cup.

3. Put a tea bag in.

4. Pour the water in.

5. Take a seat.

6. Press the start button and relax.

Special thanks and credits to:

Managore - Creator of the font

Elthen - Creator of ME (the cat sprite and animations)

Purrple Cat - Creator of the music

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
